OOC: what I mean is that there is a faction in this RPG that is called 
the Tripredacus. I know about the three-guy council thing, but it can 
get confusing! As I said maybe you could change the name to "The 
Agent"... or back to Ravage simply! =)

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> 
> > OOC: Sorry if I mess your fun, but the Tripredacus is a faction in
> > this RPG. Maybe you should rename your character, unless he truly 
is a
> > member of the Tripreds.
> >
> 
> Actually the Tripredacus he might be refering to is the trio of 
predacon
> leaders on cybertron who hold the title: Tripredacus Council. Ravage 
would
> count as a Tripredacus Agent. :)
> 
> Can easily see where the confusion mounts... :o)
